message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly above $120. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose a special introductory price of $150. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product if it doesn't meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the exceptional benefits of our product!
